page.title: 18Nether Stowey:Leisure - 1
page.content: As Nether Stowey is a rural area it is not surprising that many people enjoy gardening as their main hobby. Walking is also a popular pastime in such a beautiful location whilst others enjoy photography. Horse riding on the hills and along the lanes provides pleasure for some and there are riding stables in the village. Some locals regard fox and stag hunting as their recreation. A lot of people enjoy reading and use the village library. Home computers are still a minority interest. Wine making, cookery and knitting are popular. A good number of families enjoy music and sport, and for others television is their only interest.
